description.ko: 인간과 기계의 경계가 흐려지는 첨단 디스토피아의 심장부로 뛰어드세요. 네온-V는 데이터와 네온 빛 꿈으로 세워진 도시의 비에 젖은 거리를 비춥니다.
description.en: Dive into the heart of a high-tech dystopia where the line between humanity and machine blurs. NEON-V illuminates the rain-slicked streets of a city built on data and neon dreams.

prompt: Cinematic wide shot of a sprawling cyberpunk metropolis at night, towering skyscrapers with glowing neon-V holograms, rainy streets reflecting vibrant purple and cyan lights, flying vehicles navigating through dense urban canyons, hyper-detailed futuristic architecture, 8k resolution, synthwave aesthetic.
